Room.Name: Swamp Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: The main path seems to go through a swamp to the north, and south into a short and narrow valley.
Room.LongDescription: The swamp water is still and dark, with both living and dead trees standing in it. Moss seems to hang from almost everything, and bubbles slowly form in the mud and burst, emitting a foul stench. The gas from the mud may even be slightly toxic. Strange there doesn't seem to be birds in this part of the forest.
